name: The Swirl
description:
Take one hardboiled detective, an abandoned theatre, a ghostly otherworld, and what do you get? A caper worth seeing to believe

"As for the sun... no idea where its gone, just a buncha swirls in the sky now. Been hearing rumours about a place outta town, something about it being the catalyst of this supposed monochrome phenomenon. No idea where they got their info, pretty sure that's impossible."

This adventure takes you on a journey into the outskirts of a colourless town and the mystery of the now permanently closed Cavalier Theatre, a place full of dark tales. Learn about its history, those who were struck by its curse, and venture deep into the colourful world of the Tear. 

Will you make it out? Or will you become one with... the Swirl?

A project by Dream Team for Ludem Dare 2021 Game Jam, using the theme 'Unstable.'

If you liked the game, you can vote for it here!

 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/the-swirl

Dream Team is an Australian four member team of participants consisting of:

Harley Brown | Team Lead, Narrative Design, Script

Amanda Parks | 2D Art, Backgrounds

Jane Wei | Music, Sound Design, Programming

Samantha Handley | Character Design, Character Sprites, UI Design

Virtual Instruments:

East West Composer Cloud

Spitfire Audio BBC Symphony Orchestra

Serum

Fonts:

'All Rights Reserved' by junkohanhero

'Badly Stamped' by APG Studios

'Elegant Typerwiter' By Lukas Krakora
